participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and thoughtful, she enjoys learning and is excited about motherhood.
participant_1.background: i'm pregnant with my first child. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Serene and introspective, he values peace and self-discovery.
participant_2.background: i am a buddhist. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i haven't spoken in three months. i like meditation. i live in alaska.
